main event: A witness observed a silver, circular object in the sky over Albuquerque, New Mexico on April 21, 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a pea and bright in color., The object moved at a 45-degree angle downward before changing course to the north., The observation lasted 5 minutes., The object was one of multiple reported sightings in the area., Weather conditions at the time were clear and dry.
witness description: A driver who noticed the object over the mountains
